name: viewer-request
description: Viewer Request Edge Lambda for Dashkite Site

scripts.build: rm -rf node_modules lib deploy; mkdir lib; mkdir deploy; npm install; coffee --transpile --inline-map -o lib/ src/; rm -rf node_modules; npm install --only=production; cp -r node_modules lib/node_modules; zip -qr -9 package.zip lib; mv package.zip ../../files/default-lambdas/viewer-request.zip

author: David Harper
